feed.title: Proposal: MultiBit as default desktop client on bitcoin.org

entry.title: Proposal: MultiBit as default desktop client on bitcoin.org
entry.summary: The speaker in the given context votes "yes" to have MultiBit replace Bitcoin-Qt as the recommended desktop wallet app. According to their opinion, most users will be happier with this change. They also mention that it is easy to switch back if this decision turns out to be incorrect.
